channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Weeds/rubbish, 12th June
item.description:
Parts of street currently very overgrown with weeds, and rubbish everywhere. Reported weeds over a month ago and nothing has been done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Alexandra Drive, West Norwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fresh dog dirt, 12th June
item.description:
There is an issue of fresh dog dirt directly outside 15A and 16 Hardings Lane. The dog owner failed to remove. Please address at the earliest opportunity. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hardings Lane, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedge/bus across pavement, 12th June
item.description:
Hello, the hedge or bush from the property on the corner of the A2/Stratheden Road is so overgrown the majority of the pavement is taken up by it so you have to almost walk in the road on a blind corner. It urgently needs addressing before the whole pavement is completely un-usable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Shooters Hill Road, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Crossing out of action again, 12th June
item.description:
To whom this may concern , there has been many requests to update the crossing as it is outdated and not to current standards , it is continuously out of action, the disabled crossing for deaf and blind people has not worked for many monthsand nobody seems to care, the crossing is now totally out of action again, this crossing allows many school children to cross the road daily ,children’s lives are being put at risk at the sake of updating the crossing , do we need another day on North Cray Road before the crossing is updated and fixed once and for all, BLOOD will be on Bexly councils hands if not UPDATED !!!!!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Cray Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large freestanding Pilates advertising board at kerb edge by pelican crossing seemingly related to the upstairs gym at 250-252 High St Beckenham nr jct with The Drive., 12th June
item.description:
Large freestanding Pilates advertising board at kerb edge by pelican crossing seemingly related to the upstairs gym at 250-252 High St Beckenham nr jct with The Drive. This is the latest of many occurrences of advertising boards, plant pots, a rubber mat being placed on the public footway and a light projection advertisement on the footway. Seen 11/6/25 but this sign has been so positioned for a month or more

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 199-203, High Street, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Opp KILN THEATRE, 12th June
item.description:
Report submitted by pub opposite, at 12/06/2025 00:03 cat is seen to run over KILBURN HIGH ROAD, opposite KILN THEATRE on the BRENT side of the road. Passer by picks up dying animal and what he then does it not recorded on footage - assumed to be deposited by roadside nearby.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Street cleaning - Dead animal on street
